Articles.Content:
Make some sort of wind tunnel so you can see the aerodynamics of your ship and measure the drag. Also I do understand that this game is just a simulator but it can be more than that.

Add multiplayer phasing and allow you to switch on the spot, sorta like identical dimensions.

So say someone speeds up time and then you are trying to perform some precise maneuver you dont crash into the Mun! You could just switch to say.. Phase two and then you could speed up time to what you want while they are aswell. Iunno just two ideas I thought up.

-I think one of the devs has mentioned a wind tunnel, but I'm not really sure.

-A wind tunnel would only be implemented after a proper aerodynamic model is implemented.

-Never suggest anything about multiplayer on this forum. If you are going to suggest it, it has been suggested already multiple times.

Otherwise yes, a wind tunnel would be a nice addition to the space center.
Wind tunnel has been suggested before. Multiplayer is on the what-not-to-suggest list.
